name: Donphan
flavorText:
It has sharp, hard
tusks and a rugged
hide. Its TACKLE is strong enough
to knock down a
house.

previous.name: Phanpy
previous.flavorText:
It swings its long
snout around play­
fully, but because it is so strong,
that can be dan­
gerous.

next.name: Porygon2
next.flavorText:
This upgraded
version of PORYGON
is designed for space exploration.
It can't fly,
though.

snout around play­
fully, but because it is so strong,
that can be dan­
gerous.
